title: Do we have a quota limitation to call the MapService and MapControl in UWP app?
body: I want to use MapService and MapControl in our UWP app, we know there are quota limitation for Bing Maps Keys, but we are not sure if this limitation is expanded to the MapService and MapControls.

comments.body: Yes, the same terms of use and limits that apply to Bing maps apply to the Windows map controls.
